title: President Obama to Host Town Hall in Portsmouth Area on Tuesday | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




August 05, 2009

 



President Obama to Host Town Hall in Portsmouth Area on Tuesday




THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  ____________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                           August 5, 2009  President Obama to Host Town Hall in Portsmouth Area on Tuesday WASHINGTON – President Barack Obama will visit the Portsmouth area of New Hampshire on Tuesday, August 11, 2009 to hold a town hall. More details, including coverage details, are not yet available but will be released in the coming days.
